title: Sustainable open data ecosystems in smart cities: A platform theory-based analysis of 19 European cities
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Cities, Volume 148

Author(s): Martin Lnenicka, Anastasija Nikiforova, Antoine Clarinval, Mariusz Luterek, Daniel Rudmark, Sebastian Neumaier, Karlo Kević, Manuel Pedro Rodríguez Bolívar
